name: Pants of the Poo
description:
Almost 2 decades of C# corporate development experience, currently doing Angular UI/C# API work.  Heavy math background (I was an actuary at one point).  A few months of Unity experience.  Electronic music production, guitar, piano, recording, mixing.  I live in the  central United States.

The Goal:  Get the first level completed, then early access sales on Itch and Steam.  Possibly some crowdfunding with personal game integration for backers (sounds and/or graphics).  After that, fill out the remaining levels (there will be five at this point).

Project Background:  My 8 year old son suggested the concept and I thought it was awesome (in the vein of Shower With Your Dad Simulator 2015 and Super Amazing Wagon Adventure - truly strange games that are awesome).
